Sentencas: This paper presents an experimental study of a direct-flame type solid oxide fuel cell (DFFC).
Titulo: A direct-flame solid oxide fuel cell (DFFC) operated on methane, propane, and butane

Sentencas: The operation principle of this system is based on the combination of a combustion flame with a solid oxide fuel cell (SCFC) in a simple, no-chamber setup.
Titulo: A direct-flame solid oxide fuel cell (DFFC) operated on methane, propane, and butane

Sentencas: The flame front serves as fuel reformer located a few millimeters from the anode surface while at the same time providing the heat required for SOFC operation.
Titulo: A direct-flame solid oxide fuel cell (DFFC) operated on methane, propane, and butane

Sentencas: Experiments were performed using 13-mm-diameter planar SOFCs with Ni-based anode, samaria-doped ceria electrolyte and cobaltite cathode.
Titulo: A direct-flame solid oxide fuel cell (DFFC) operated on methane, propane, and butane

Sentencas: At the anode, a 45-mm-diameter flat-flame burner provided radially homogeneous methane/air, propane/air, and butane/air rich premixed flames.
Titulo: A direct-flame solid oxide fuel cell (DFFC) operated on methane, propane, and butane

Sentencas: The cell performance reaches power densities of up to 120 mW cm(-2), varying systematically with flame conditions.
Titulo: A direct-flame solid oxide fuel cell (DFFC) operated on methane, propane, and butane

Sentencas: It shows a strong dependence on cell temperature.
Titulo: A direct-flame solid oxide fuel cell (DFFC) operated on methane, propane, and butane

Sentencas: From thermodynamic calculations, both H, and CO were identified as species that are available as fuel for the SOFC.
Titulo: A direct-flame solid oxide fuel cell (DFFC) operated on methane, propane, and butane

Sentencas: The results demonstrate the potential of this system for fuel-flexible power generation using a simple setup.
Titulo: A direct-flame solid oxide fuel cell (DFFC) operated on methane, propane, and butane
